"Type-a-Pal" - A personalized keyboard that learns your typing habits and provides customized shortcuts for frequently used words and phrases.
"Smart-Type" - A keyboard that uses artificial intelligence to predict what you'll type next based on your previous keystrokes and suggests relevant words or phrases.
"Touch-Type" - A keyboard with a touch-sensitive surface that can detect the pressure and position of your fingers, allowing you to type without physically touching the keys.
"Mood-Type" - A keyboard that changes color and texture based on your mood, providing a tactile and visual experience that can help you relax or focus.
"Voice-Type" - A keyboard that allows you to type using voice commands, making it ideal for hands-free typingactors and performers, or for people with mobility issues.
